website_summaries.verdict: A large, heavy-duty cooler with commercial-grande insulation.
pros: Roto-molded construction is very thick to stand up to abuse
A freezer-style gasket keeps contents cold for hours, and the unit is movable with 7-inch wheels and a military-grade nylon rope
Wears molded tie-down slots and includes helpful accessories like a hanging wire basket, a cooler divider, and a cup holder
cons: Cooler is approximately 40 pounds empty, and may require multiple people to move when full

customer_reviews.title: it just made me feel better! I am going to get two more and ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler more than met our expectations. We chilled it for a full day and night with ice before packing it. Packed it with mostly frozen food and hit Lake Powell in the 90+ heat. Four days into our trip we still had frozen food. We only added a half a bag of ice every other day and I don’t think it was actually necessary, it just made me feel better! I am going to get two more and get rid of our other coolers. I love the wheels and handles as well. Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Caden / Asher Casebolt’s music

customer_reviews.title: We like the bottle opener and very impressed with the heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it a couple time but it seems to keep ice well. We like the bottle opener and very impressed with the heavy duty wheels. This is a heavy cooler once full and the wheels make it handle easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things ice cold!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a less expensive alternative to the "popular" branded rotomolded coolers. I went with this one because of having wheels and reading good reviews online. I bought this cooler and threw a couple blocks of ice and three bags (10# each) of regular ice, 48 cold beers, some wine and water. After five days of being outside, everything is still ice cold!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, works great. Only thing drain plug didn't come with a chain so I lost and had to buy an extra drain plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff VanReyendam

customer_reviews.title: Pre-chill the cooler as recommended by the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Kept my beer cold for 6 days on my last camping trip! Temps were in the 80's during the day and in the 60's at night. Pre-chill the cooler as recommended by the manufacturer! Looking forward to this summer when its 90 degrees my beer will be ice cold !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition with all listed accessories. It is perfect for weekend camping trips. Seems tough and holds enough for the family. The vacuum release button is a nice touch. Like any of these kinds of coolers, beware that they are heavy. Especially the larger ones like this. The wheels are a necessity. If possible, get the cooler where it will be travelling before loading. It's about 40 lbs empty.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not the superstar I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so heavy! I love the dividing cutting board and the basket and cup holder that come with it. The handle has been sturdy and the wheels work fine, but our Coleman from the brick and mortar king retailer keeps ice cold the exact same if you pre-cool the cooler. This cooler doesn’t perform any better if you start with warm drinks in a warm interior.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cool for long time
customer_reviews.text: We still had ice after 3 days of camping in the sun, which was impressive. I do wish the handle you pull the cooler with was longer or maybe adjustable - we had to walk a long distance with it and the weight and awkwardness of having to bend down to pull it meant we had to make more stops than was necessary. Happy with it otherwise, the accessories are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around, works better than the competetion!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the competition. Holds Ice just as long if not longer, includes all the accessories so you don't have to by them. Would definitely buy this cooler again and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Hunsucker

customer_reviews.title: Like name brand... but better.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy a name brand cooler! This brand is extremely high quality and beats other name brands! Having the wheels on the back comes in handy and you'll spend at least double for a comparable one at the department store.
customer_reviews.author: Big PP boi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cooler. I have a Yeti and this cooler is made just as well. I love the color. The wheels work great. I love the bottle openers on each side of the front. I would recommend this cooler to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Casto

customer_reviews.title: Great ice chest for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great ice chest, fraction of the price of the brand it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck3

customer_reviews.title: Was loving this cooler until the rubber latch tore.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this cooler to keep on my pontoon. I was loving it. It did a good job of keeping the ice from melting. However, now the latch is broke (after only 2 months of real use) and I have been unable to find a customer service number.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Plain

customer_reviews.title: You can't actually roll it
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, sturdy, heavy-duty cooler. As nice as a Yeti without the price tag. But, the wheels aren't useable. There is no way to wheel the cooler without clipping your heels (unless it's completely empty, and even then it's difficult). I'm happy with the cooler, but I wouldn't recommend it if your are truly trying to find a portable option.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Moves easily and hold ice great
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. It holds ice for at least 7 days. The wheels make it easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Works better than any ice chest ive ever had.
customer_reviews.text: in low 90's for four days. I never had to ad ice on my camping trip. my other ice chest I had to add ice three times the same camping trip. I will be buying another one soon. Its a little pricey but worth every penny and I still saved money not buying the yeti brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach trips
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my old cooler that has been through beach, traveling and bbqs. This cooler is great, has the size and wheels I was looking for. Added plus, the divider that turns into a cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: SimplyLil

customer_reviews.title: Quality on wheels!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great all the quality and a couple more gifts Inc and mine Has wheels !!! Does your Roto molded 70qt cooler have that? Mine does
customer_reviews.author: Bldaz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it to the test yet, but I've gone over every inch of this thing and it is absolutely top notch. We'll see how well it keeps the ice!
customer_reviews.author: Roman S. Van Allen

customer_reviews.title: Inside wall bubbling after 7 mo, 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely "cheaper" than the other leading brands. Unfortunately, after only 7 months of ownership and 3-4 uses/camping trips, I noticed the inside wall bubbling out after returning home from a camping trip. Could it be a result of altitude change? Sitting in the sun for a couple hours at the beach? Regardless, the quality is clearly not there. Go with an Orca, RTIC, Pelican, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Ice
customer_reviews.text: This cooler did not seem to keep the ice as long as a previous cooler (not yeti). it is durable and has some great storage features especially for the beach or tailgating.
customer_reviews.author: Jinger

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color and no chain on the drain plug
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great cooler BUT I received the wrong color and the plug does not have a chain on it. Ordered it for a specific event so might not have time to exchange it for the right color I ordered in the first place. Disappointed that I did not get the right color.
customer_reviews.author: DKen

customer_reviews.title: If you wish to save $100 over the regular market brand
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks like you could drop it out of a plane and it would be fine it is very sturdy and it looks like it is going to keep things cold in definitely
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My ice stays cool for a whole week and comes with accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great value awesome cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, this is a cooler investment that will fulfill its purpose for years.
customer_reviews.author: Helmut Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Used this to store meat on a long trip. ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this to store meat on a long trip. The original ice pack never broke a sweat after 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: E. Capozzoli

customer_reviews.title: Ice longetivity
customer_reviews.text: I was sold by the look and the length of time ice survives..up to 6 days but so far I have only seen about 3 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a better handle
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler but the handle is to short. When you load up the cooler and try to walk the cooler rides up your Achilles
customer_reviews.author: Troy Gray

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Beast of a cooler. Wheels are a must. Ice lasts. Worth the discount over Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Stays very cold and so much easier to deal with on wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooler for the money. Wheels are sturdy but cooler is very heavy when it’s full of ice and beer. Seems to be insulated as well as my yeti.
customer_reviews.author: jmdhfloyd

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t tested it yet
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had the chance to test it out yet. My brother-in-law have one and he love it.
customer_reviews.author: ann s

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for a friend and will be getting myself one soon. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sale Burwell

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loveeeeee this cooler. My husband and I bought this for a camping trip, ice stays froZen in the cooler for about 2 days! Love the color also.
customer_reviews.author: hard38

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wheels are great and it keeps items cold for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the cooler!!! Ice stays frozen and the wheels are nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this cooler. Better value than yeti plus having the wheels on a 70qt. No brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Alan rosenbeck

product_meta.title: Seavilis Milee-Wheeled Cooler 70QT Marine CAMO (Included $50 Accessories) Divider, Basket and Cup Holder are Free.
product_meta.description:
Want to have a camping trip full of ice-cold drinks and fresh meat or vegetables for BBQ?
Afraid of ice-cream melts when you have a power cut at summer?
This 70QT heavy duty cooler with wheels is the ideal choice for camping, fishing, boating, party, beach, outdoor and indoor daily use.

Product Details
Heavy-duty roto-molded construction for durable outdoor use.
Thick, insulated design offers ice retention for up to 6 days; dry ice compatible
D-Seal provides an airtight seal to keep contents cold and is removable for easy cleanup
Stainless-steel locking plates (can be used as built-in bottle openers) and tie-down slats help to prevent your foods damaged by bears or animals
Lid lock with an integrated hinge helps prevent accidental or unexpected lid closing
Antiskid feet for smooth travel
Removable, heavy-duty nylon rope handles
Certified materials are nontoxic, tasteless and approved for direct contact with food
TPE T-Latch enables secure closure
Drain Valve design with recessed drain plug ,which make the melted ice flow out easily
Built-in UV resistance helps prevent plastic breakdown and fading caused by sun exposure


Outer Dimension :L33.3*W17.2*H17.6 inch / L84.06*W43.7*H44.7 CM 

Inner Dimension: L27.4* W12.2* H12.8 Inch / L69.6* W31* H32.5CM
feature_bullets: Useful Accessories:Including FREE USEFUL basket, Cup holder and divider£¨Save you $50.00).
Technique And Material: Indestructible Rotomolded Thermoplastic Construction with commercial grade insulation provides a longer ice retention time.We use Certifiedapproved material.
Heavy Duty Wheels:Heavy duty 7'' wheels make it easy to carry around
More Nice Features:Built-in Bottle openers,Freezer Style gasket,Military-grade nylon handles,Molded Tie-Down Slots,TPE T-Latch,No-Leak Drain Plug etc.
TIPs:Always use high density ice for better performance. Ice from ice maker is low density.Prechill before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
